goals__remit:
Euraffex is a Brussels based powerhouse boutique agency, specialised in public relations, communications, reputation management, and fully integrated European affairs solutions.  
Our core expertise is predominantly promoting and defending the interests of national diplomatic representations, as well as, highly complex and challenging sectors. Having experts with vast experience in working with heads of states, European institutions, as well as controversial sectors, we form a complimentary and compatible partner to our clients.
relevant_communication: We provide skills enhancement and capacity building for organisations dealing with the European Institutions and the pan European media.
customers: ADA University# Fur Europe# Mangalis Hotel Group# Caspian Invest# Danish Shipowners' Association# European Confederation of Independent Trade Unions# EuroCommerce# Covered Bond & Mortgage Council# TEPPFA
